additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Sugar, Glucose syrup (Sources include Wheat), Milk solids, Cocoa mass, Cocoa butter, Vegetable oil, Vegetable fat, Barley malt extract, Emulsifier (Soy Lecithin), Salt, Egg white, Natural flavour (Vanilla extract).

additionalProperty.name: Contains
additionalProperty.value: Barley, Milk, Soy, Egg & Wheat. A Mars bar contains Milk Chocolate 40%, Nougat 31%, Caramel 28%. Milk chocolate contains a minimum of 25% cocoa solids and 22% milk solids.

additionalProperty.name: Allergen
additionalProperty.value: Contains Egg, Contains Barley, Contains Soy, Contains Wheat, Contains Milk

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: This pack is for retail sale intact. Individual units not to be sold separately. Guarantee of Satisfaction: Your Mars chocolates are made of the finest food ingredients. They should reach you in excellent condition. If you are not satisfied in any way, please call 1800 245 455 in Australia or 0800 444 443 in New Zealand. All of our cocoa volume for MARS Bars comes from Rainforest Alliance Certified farms and is traceable to our factory, helping protect the environment and support farmers. www.mars.com.au/rainforestalliance
